Detailed Description

Processor to extract MIP calibrations from muon beam runs.

Author:
A.Vargas DESY
Date:
November 2010

Field Documentation

int CALICE::AngleTrackFinder::_trackNoHitsThreshold [private]

choose amplitude to be used to perform the mip cut

minimum number of hits for which a track is considered to be a muon track (used only with TrackSelectionMode=NHITS)
